title: Apple and Celery Salad with Peanuts
summary: Apple and Celery Salad with Peanuts might be just the side dish you are searching for. For 73 cents per serving, this recipe covers 6% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. One serving contains 160 calories, 2g of protein, and 10g of fat. This recipe serves 8. 1 person has made this recipe and would make it again. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes around 45 minutes. A mixture of apples such as fuji, lemon juice, parsley, and a handful of other ingredients are all it takes to make this recipe so flavorful. It is a good option if you're following a caveman, gluten free, primal, and vegan diet. With a spoonacular score of 48%, this dish is solid. Similar recipes are Stir-Fried Celery with Peanuts, Apple Celery Salad, and Celery-Apple Salad.
instructions: Preparation                                                        Whisk together lemon juice and mustard in a large bowl. Add oil in a stream, whisking until emulsified. Add apples, celery, and parsley, tossing to coat. Just before serving, sprinkle with peanuts.                                                Cooks' note:            • Salad may be made 3 hours ahead and chilled, covered.

steps.step: Whisk together lemon juice and mustard in a large bowl.
Add oil in a stream, whisking until emulsified.
Add apples, celery, and parsley, tossing to coat. Just before serving, sprinkle with peanuts.
• Salad may be made 3 hours ahead and chilled, covered.
